none.$description: No shadow. Used for flat elements like buttons, inputs, and elements that should appear flush with their container.

small.$description: Subtle elevation. Used for cards and containers that need minimal depth separation from background.

default.$description: Standard elevation. Baseline for cards, panels, and standard containers. Provides clear but not prominent depth.

large.$description: Prominent elevation. Used for modals, dialogs, dropdowns, and floating elements that need clear separation and focus.

extra-large.$description: Maximum elevation. Used for high-priority modals, tooltips, and elements that need maximum visual separation and prominence.
